title: Intensive Short-Term Online Course for Mathematics Certification Exam Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematics concepts at middle school level
context.additional_context: Operation of a personalized learning materials, weekly assignments, and formative assessment-centered feedback system feasible in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain math concepts required for certification exams (e.g., equations, functions, statistics) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish an individualized learning plan to complete all learning modules within one week.
Learners diagnose learning gaps through weekly quizzes and achieve an accuracy rate of over 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
